channel.title: SONIX
channel.description: Sonix official electronic music podcast, including DJ mixes from djsonix.com website in genres of uplifting trance, melodic trance, vocal trance, epic trance, tech trance, progressive trance, progressive house, electro house, minimal techno, progressive breaks, nu school breaks, drum n bass, liquid drum n bass, happy hardcore, trancecore, hardstyle, hard dance, techno, hard house, hard trance, psy trance, goa, ambient, chill out and other electronica
channel.itunes:subtitle: SONIX
channel.itunes:summary: Sonix official electronic music podcast, including DJ mixes from djsonix.com website in genres of uplifting trance, melodic trance, vocal trance, epic trance, tech trance, progressive trance, progressive house, electro house, minimal techno, progressive breaks, nu school breaks, drum n bass, liquid drum n bass, happy hardcore, trancecore, hardstyle, hard dance, techno, hard house, hard trance, psy trance, goa, ambient, chill out and other electronica
channel.itunes:author: Sonix
